item.description:
4th Annual Taste of Block Island
I am putting this out there to see if there is interest if there is I will work on detail such as ferry times. Please post a note if you are interested.
Location: Block Island
Description: Over 60 Block Island businesses have joined together to highlight the many different events and activities island visitors can enjoy. From gallery openings, wine & beer tastings, to shopping discounts, hotel specials, restaurant specials, and kayak tours, Block Island presents the very best it has to offer during this great 3 day event. Purchase a button for $5 at the Chamber. Call (401) 466-2474
item.name: Taste of Block Island
